## Disclaimer
This document summarizes the content of chapter 1 of [@GWH2013a]. The main objective of thi summary is to transform the summarized text and the programming code between the text into a document based on the paradigm of [`Literate Programming`](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Literate_programming).
